org.grouplens.lenskit.collections

Class CollectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.CollectionUtils

  • public final class CollectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various helper methods for working with collections (particularly Fastutil collections).

    Compatibility: Public

    • Method Detail

      • fast

        @Deprecated
public static <E> java.lang.Iterable<E> fast(java.lang.Iterable<E> iter)
        Deprecated. Fast iteration has gone away. This method now does nothing.
        Use the fast iterator of an iterable, if available.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of object to iterate.
        Parameters:
        iter - An iterable to wrap
        Returns:
        An iterable using the underlying iterable's fast iterator, if present, to do iteration. Fast iteration is detected by looking for a fastIterator() method, like is present in Long2DoubleMap.FastEntrySet.

      • fastFilterAndLimit

        @Deprecated
public static <E> FastIterable<E> fastFilterAndLimit(java.lang.Iterable<E> iter,
                                                Predicate<? super E> pred,
                                                int limit)
        Deprecated. Fast iteration has gone away.
        Fast-aware filter-and-limit operation, filtering an iterable. If the underlying iterable does not support fast iteration, then the returned iterable's fast iteration will fall back to ordinary iteration.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of data in the iterable.
        Parameters:
        iter - The iterable to filter and limit.
        pred - The predicate for filtering.
        limit - The maximum number of items to return (negative for unlimited).
        Returns:
        A fast iterable filtering and limiting.

      • objectCollection

        public static <E> ObjectCollection<E> objectCollection(java.util.Collection<E> objects)
        Wrap a Collection in an ObjectCollection.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of objects.
        Parameters:
        objects - The collection of objects.
        Returns:
        The collection as an ObjectCollection.

      • repeat

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> repeat(T obj,
                           int n)
        Return a list that repeats a single object multiple times.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of list elements.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object.
        n - The size of the list.
        Returns:
        A list containing obj n times.

      • emptyFastCollection

        @Deprecated
public static <E> FastCollection<E> emptyFastCollection()
        Deprecated. Just use a standard empty collection.
        Create an empty, immutable fast collection.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of fast collection.
        Returns:
        An empty fast collection.

      • interval

        public static IntList interval(int from,
               int to)
        Create an IntList that contains all numbers in a specified interval.
        Parameters:
        from - The first number (inclusive)
        to - the last number (exclusive).
        Returns:
        A list containing the integers in the interval [from,to).
